text: Good morning to a snowy Shropshire. Today, we'll be in #Bridgnorth with our colleagues from @EnvAgencyMids supporting residents and businesses. Our Highways team will also be on the ground commencing clean-up and repairs providing water levels allow. Stay safe. https://t.co/EPfqHv9sQE
